name: Little Boy. No Explosion
description:
In an attempt to bury the bomb, our friend from Hiroshima, realized that the rope broke!

Now you can help him guide the Little Boy to the deepest possible.

but be very careful, because every 10 feet speed increases.

Little Boy - Explosion In a simple and addictive game that will make you come back to try to achieve the best result.

Little Boy Control:

Touch and hold the left side of the screen: the bomb moves to the left

tap and hold the right side of the screen: the bomb moves to the right

when not playing: the bomb is in the center of the screen

version 1.0

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air....

www.hellomyplanet.com
